Text.Page:
Killian's servants, naroder arachnens, have us surrounded, snd the way they wield those whips, it's like they have an endless supply of minions.

If we don't strike, they'll overrun us.

Can you help us?

You really don't like arachnens, do you? It shows!

The whips are a nice touch.

Kaia's blessings be with you, .
The naroder arachnens are still out there, <PCNAME>, bringing more and more pressure to bear against us!
